Field Detail

PLAINTEXT_LOCALHOST_PROXY_PORT

public static final int PLAINTEXT_LOCALHOST_PROXY_PORT
This is the local proxy port data is relayed to on the "server" side of P2P connections. NOT IN CONSTANTS BECAUSE LanternUtils INITIALIZES THE LOGGER, WHICH CAN'T HAPPEN IN CONSTANTS DUE TO THE CONFIGURATION SEQUENCE IN PRODUCTION.

persistCredentials

public static boolean persistCredentials()
Determines whether or not oauth data should be persisted to disk. It is only persisted if we can do so safely and securely but also cleanly. Fixme: this should actually be a user preference refs #586

Returns:
true if credentials should be persisted to disk, otherwise false.

getTargetForPath

public static Object getTargetForPath(Object root,
                                      String path)
                               throws IllegalAccessException,
                                      InvocationTargetException,
                                      NoSuchMethodException
Accesses the object to set a property on with a trivial json-pointer syntax as in /object1/object2. Public for testing. Note this is actually not use in favor of ModelMutables that consolidates all accessible methods.

Throws:
IllegalAccessException
InvocationTargetException
NoSuchMethodException

waitForFile

public static void waitForFile(File file)
The completion of the native calls is dependent on OS process scheduling, so we need to wait until files actually exist.

Parameters:
file - The file to wait for.

photoUrlBase

public static String photoUrlBase()
We call this dynamically instead of using a constant because the API PORT is set at startup, and we don't want to create a race condition for retrieving it.

Returns:
The base URL for photos.
